title: JISULIFE Handheld Mini Fan, 3 IN 1 USB Rechargeable Portable Fan [12-19 Working Hours] with Power Bank, Flashlight, Pocket Design for Travel/Summer/Concerts/Lash, Gifts for Women (Black)
description: Small In Size, Big On Function: Featuring a Fan, Flashlight, and Backup Power Bank, the JISULIFE pocket bear fan is your summer go-to essential for staying cool on hot days while offering versatile functionality to meet your diverse needs

top_reviews.title: Buy this fan!
top_reviews.body: Trust the reviews! This fan is amazing! It is mighty and delivers perfect cooling. I love the style of it. It’s small enough to carry in my purse, but it can also sit upright on my desk if I want. Battery lasts for quite a long time! As a person who is always hot, this little fan is a lifesaver! Factor in the additional perks of it being a portable charger for your phone and a stand alone flashlight and it becomes a no-brainer! Buy this fan! It’s worth it! Read more
